ProstateRadTumourLocations

These are the options for the radical prostatectomy locations.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    49370004 Lateral
    90069004 Posterolateral
    255551008 Posterior
    255549009 Anterior
    64344009 Bladder neck
    43674008 Apical
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-prostate-rad-tumour-locations
